CustomField.formula: IF (RecordType.Name = 'Ceilings Contact', IF( LEN( Phone) = 0, 0,10) + IF( LEN( Email) = 0, 0,35) + IF( LEN(MailingStreet) = 0, 0,10) + IF( LEN(Title) = 0, 0,25) + IF( ISPICKVAL( Contact_Relationship__c ,""), 0,10) + IF( LEN(ReportsToId) = 0, 0, 10) , IF( ISPICKVAL(Contact_Type__c ,""), 0,25) + IF( ISPICKVAL(Role_Type__c ,""), 0,25) + IF( AND( LEN( Email)= 0, Does_Not_Have_Email__c = FALSE),0,25) + IF( LEN(Title) = 0, 0,25) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Score must equal 100. Fields Required: Title, Phone, Email, Address & Status
CustomField.label: Data Quality Score
